title: Daevon
content: Daevon je město poblíž Ard Carraigh, hlavního města Kaedwenu. It is in this general area that Geralt, Ciri a Triss were travelling when the sorceress was struck with an unfortunate case of gastritis. They tried to stop at a fort but were refused entry and advised to catch up with a caravan that had passed through the day before.
